sentence.Network_en: They looked on music and art lessons as dispensable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们认为音乐课和美术课是可有可无的。

sentence.Network_en: Delete what is dispensable and give more prominence to the essentials.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以不说的去掉,该说的就可以更突出.

sentence.Network_en: Since none of the four is dispensable, they are equally important.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上,这四种力量既然是缺一不可的, 所以是同等重要的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'permissible in special circumstances'): from medieval Latin dispensabilis, from Latin dispensare (see dispense)

entry.tran: 非必要的;可有可无的;不重要的
entry.def: If someone or something is dispensable they are not really needed.

example.ex: All those people in the middle are dispensable.
example.tran: 所有那些立场骑墙的人都可要可不要。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being dispensed with or done without;

auth_sentence.content: It turns them into earnest but dispensable blogs.
auth_sentence.res_content: It turns them into earnest but dispensable blogs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It turns them into earnest but dispensable blogs.

auth_sentence.content: Vieira de Mello had inadvertently made himself dispensable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vieira de Mello had inadvertently made himself dispensable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vieira de Mello had inadvertently made himself dispensable.

auth_sentence.content: But such global observations only constitute the second half of The Dispensable Nation.
auth_sentence.res_content: But such global observations only constitute the second half of The Dispensable Nation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But such global observations only constitute the second half of The Dispensable Nation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可分配的,不是必要的,可有可无的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dispense分配+able可以……的→dispensable可分配的→能分送出去的,不重要的
ex出+pens花费,支付+ive……的→要花很多钱出去的
dispense分配+ary场地→dispensary分配[药]的地方→药房

stems_affixes.value_cn: 费用, 代价, 损失

stems_affixes.word_buile: pens花费,支付+ion表名词→用以花费,支付的
pro多+pens花费,支付+ity性质,特性→某[方面]花费的多→嗜好
suspense[v.担心;悬而不决]+ion表名词→n.悬挂,暂停,停职;悬[置]架
com全部+pens支付+ate表动词→为……而全部支付→赔偿
dis分开+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]

Sentence.sentence: Amid the current concerns about the federal deficit, reaching toward the stars seems a dispensable luxury—as if saving one-thousandth of a single year's budget would solve our problems.

sentences.cn: 个人财产中不必要的项目
